18using System.Collections.Generic;
19using UnityEngine;
20using Types;
21using UnityEngine.UI;
22using System.Linq;
23using System.IO;
24using Valve.Newtonsoft.Json;
25
26namespace Valve.VR.InteractionSystem
27{
34 public class CaseController : MonoBehaviour
35 {
36 [SerializeField]
37 private Transform _player;
41 [SerializeField]
42 private List<GameObject> _caseSteps;
46 [SerializeField]
47 private int _currentStep;
51 public List<string> _caseStepsHelp;
52
56 public ProjectCase loadedProject;
60 public GameObject loadedPatient;
64 private const string CASE_SUFFIX = "_edited.obj";
68 private string _jsonLocation;
72 private const string TOKEN_STEP = "Step_";
73
77 private GameObject _tmpStep;
81 private string _tmpHelp;
85 private const string CASE_LOADED_MESSAGE = "CaseController: Case Loaded!";
86
90 [SerializeField]
91 private GameObject _caseStepMessagePrefab;
95 [SerializeField]
96 private List<GameObject> _caseStepMessages = new List<GameObject>();
97
101 private bool _showAll = false;
105 private bool _trainMode = false;
106
110 [SerializeField]
111 private Material _stepMaterial;
115 [SerializeField]
116 private Material _trainMaterial;
117
121 public void SaveCase()
122 {
123 ProjectCase loadedCase = loadedProject;
124 string newLocation = loadedCase.modelLocation.Contains(CASE_SUFFIX) ? loadedCase.modelLocation : loadedCase.modelLocation.Replace(".obj", "") + CASE_SUFFIX;
125 loadedCase.steps = _caseStepsHelp;
126 loadedCase.modelLocation = newLocation;
127
128 Transform parent = loadedPatient.transform.parent;
129 Vector3 currentScale = loadedPatient.transform.localScale;
130 Vector3 currentRotation = loadedPatient.transform.eulerAngles;
131
132 if (!_showAll)
133 {
134 _caseSteps.ForEach(step => step.SetActive(true));
135 }
136
137 loadedPatient.transform.parent = null;
138 loadedPatient.transform.localScale = new Vector3(-1, 1, 1);
139 loadedPatient.transform.eulerAngles = Vector3.zero;
140
141 new OBJExporter().Export(loadedPatient, newLocation);
142
143 if (!_showAll)
144 {
145 _caseSteps.ForEach(step => {
146 step.SetActive(_caseSteps[_currentStep] == step ? true : false);
147 });
148 }
149
150 loadedPatient.transform.parent = parent;
151 loadedPatient.transform.localScale = currentScale;
152 loadedPatient.transform.eulerAngles = currentRotation;
153
154 Debug.Log(_jsonLocation);
155 File.WriteAllText(@_jsonLocation, JsonConvert.SerializeObject(loadedCase, Formatting.Indented));
156 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage("Saved successfully!");
157 }
158
166 public void CaseLoaded(ProjectCase project, List<GameObject> steps, GameObject patient, string jsonLocation)
167 {
168 _currentStep = 0;
169 loadedProject = project;
170 loadedPatient = patient;
171 _jsonLocation = jsonLocation;
172
173 _caseSteps = steps;
174 _caseStepsHelp = project.steps;
175 _caseSteps.ForEach(go => {
176 go.SetActive(false);
177 go.GetComponent<Renderer>().material = _stepMaterial;
178
179 go.AddComponent<MeshCollider>().convex = true;
180 go.GetComponent<MeshCollider>().isTrigger = true;
181 });
182
183 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage(CASE_LOADED_MESSAGE);
184
185 DisplayCaseInfo(project.caseInfo);
186 }
187
192 private void DisplayCaseInfo(CaseInfo caseInfo)
193 {
194 GameObject caseInfoTextGameObject = GameObject.Find("/OperationRoom/PatientZeroSpawn/VRUI-CaseInfo/Container/Text");
195 Text textScript = caseInfoTextGameObject.GetComponentInChildren<Text>();
196
197 textScript.text = "\n";
198 textScript.text = "\n" + caseInfo.name;
199 textScript.text += "\nPatient: " + caseInfo.patient;
200 textScript.text += "\nBirthdate: " + caseInfo.birthdate;
201 textScript.text += "\nGender: " + caseInfo.gender;
202 textScript.text += "\nCaseNumber: " + caseInfo.caseNumber;
203 textScript.text += "\nFinding: " + caseInfo.finding;
204 textScript.text += "\nInfo: " + caseInfo.info;
205 }
206
211 public void appendCaseInfoMessage(string message)
212 {
213 GameObject caseInfoTextGameObject = GameObject.Find("/OperationRoom/PatientZeroSpawn/VRUI-CaseInfo/Container/Text");
214 Text textScript = caseInfoTextGameObject.GetComponentInChildren<Text>();
215 textScript.text += message;
216 }
217
221 public void StartCase()
222 {
223 if (_trainMode)
224 {
225 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Error();
226 return;
227 }
228
229 if (_caseSteps.Count == 0)
230 {
231 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().NoMoreSteps();
232 return;
233 }
234 _showAll = false;
235 _caseSteps.ForEach(steps => steps.SetActive(false));
236 _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(true);
237 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().StartCase();
238 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage(_caseStepsHelp[_currentStep]);
239
240 _caseStepMessages.ForEach(message => Destroy(message));
241 _caseStepMessages.Clear();
242 }
243
247 public void ShowAll()
248 {
249 if (_trainMode)
250 {
251 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Error();
252 return;
253 }
254
255 if (_caseSteps.Count == 0)
256 {
257 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().NoMoreSteps();
258 return;
259 }
260
261 _showAll = true;
262 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().CaseOverview();
263 _caseSteps.ForEach(steps => steps.SetActive(true));
264 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage(CASE_LOADED_MESSAGE);
265
266 GenerateHelperMessages();
267 }
268
272 private void GenerateHelperMessages()
273 {
274 _caseStepMessages.ForEach(message => Destroy(message));
275 _caseStepMessages.Clear();
276
277 _caseSteps.ForEach(step => {
278 GameObject newMessage = Instantiate(_caseStepMessagePrefab);
279
280 Vector3 targetPos = step.GetComponent<Renderer>().bounds.center;
281 newMessage.transform.position = new Vector3(targetPos.x, targetPos.y + 0.05f, targetPos.z);
282
283 newMessage.GetComponentInChildren<Text>().text = (_caseSteps.IndexOf(step) + 1).ToString();
284 if (_caseSteps.IndexOf(step) == _currentStep)
285 {
286 newMessage.GetComponentInChildren<Text>().fontSize = (int)(newMessage.GetComponentInChildren<Text>().fontSize * 1.5f);
287 }
288
289 _caseStepMessages.Add(newMessage);
290 });
291
292 _caseStepMessages.ForEach(message => {
293 message.transform.LookAt(new Vector3(_player.position.x, _player.position.y, _player.position.z));
294 message.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(message.transform.rotation.x, -message.transform.rotation.y, message.transform.rotation.z);
295 });
296 }
297
301 public void NextStep()
302 {
303 if (_trainMode)
304 {
305 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Error();
306 return;
307 }
308
309 if (_currentStep == _caseSteps.Count - 1)
310 {
311 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().NoMoreSteps();
312 return;
313 }
314
315 if (!_showAll) _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(false);
316 _currentStep += 1;
317 _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(true);
318
319 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().StepNext();
320 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage(_caseStepsHelp[_currentStep]);
321 }
322
326 public void PreviousStep()
327 {
328 if (_trainMode)
329 {
330 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Error();
331 return;
332 }
333
334 if (_currentStep == 0)
335 {
336 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().NoMoreSteps();
337 return;
338 }
339
340 if (!_showAll) _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(false);
341 _currentStep -= 1;
342 _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(true);
343
344 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().StepBack();
345 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage(_caseStepsHelp[_currentStep]);
346 }
347
351 public void Undo()
352 {
353 if (_trainMode)
354 {
355 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Error();
356 return;
357 }
358
359 if (_caseSteps.Count == 1)
360 {
361 _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(false);
362 _tmpStep = _caseSteps[_currentStep];
363 _tmpHelp = _caseStepsHelp[_currentStep];
364 _caseSteps.RemoveAt(_currentStep);
365 _caseStepsHelp.RemoveAt(_currentStep);
366 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Undo();
367 _currentStep = 0;
368
369 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage(CASE_LOADED_MESSAGE);
370 }
371
372 if (_caseSteps.Count == 0)
373 {
374 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Error();
375 return;
376 }
377
378 _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(false);
379 _tmpStep = _caseSteps[_currentStep];
380 _tmpHelp = _caseStepsHelp[_currentStep];
381 _caseSteps.RemoveAt(_currentStep);
382 _caseStepsHelp.RemoveAt(_currentStep);
383 _currentStep -= _currentStep == 0 ? 0 : 1;
384 _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(true);
385
386 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Undo();
387 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage(_caseStepsHelp[_currentStep]);
388 }
389
393 public void Redo() {
394 if (_trainMode)
395 {
396 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Error();
397 return;
398 }
399
400 if (_tmpStep == null)
401 {
402 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Error();
403 return;
404 }
405
406 if (_caseSteps.Count != 0)
407 {
408 if (!_showAll) _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(false);
409 _currentStep += 1;
410 }
411
412 _caseSteps.Insert(_currentStep, _tmpStep);
413 _caseStepsHelp.Insert(_currentStep, _tmpHelp);
414
415 _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(true);
416
417 _tmpStep = null;
418 _tmpHelp = null;
419
420 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Redo();
421 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage(_caseStepsHelp[_currentStep]);
422 }
423
424
429 public void AddStep(GameObject newStep)
430 {
431 if (_trainMode)
432 {
433 CheckTrainStep(newStep);
434 return;
435 }
436
437 if (_caseSteps.Count != 0)
438 {
439 if (!_showAll) _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(false);
440 _currentStep += 1;
441 }
442
443 if(newStep.GetComponent<Collider>() == null)
444 {
445 newStep.AddComponent<MeshCollider>().convex = true;
446 newStep.GetComponent<MeshCollider>().isTrigger = true;
447 }
448
449 newStep.name.Replace("(Clone)", "").Replace("(Clone)", "").Replace("(Clone)", "");
450 newStep.name = TOKEN_STEP + _currentStep.ToString() + "_" + newStep.name;
451 _caseSteps.Insert(_currentStep, newStep);
452 _caseStepsHelp.Insert(_currentStep, newStep.name);
453
454 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().StepAdded();
455 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage(_caseStepsHelp[_caseStepsHelp.Count - 1]);
456 }
457
461 public void TrainStart()
462 {
463 if (_trainMode)
464 {
465 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Error();
466 return;
467 }
468
469 if (_caseSteps.Count == 0)
470 {
471 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().NoMoreSteps();
472 return;
473 }
474
475 _showAll = false;
476 _caseSteps.ForEach(steps => steps.SetActive(false));
477
478 _currentStep = 0;
479 _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(true);
480
481 _caseSteps.ForEach(step => step.GetComponent<Renderer>().material = _trainMaterial);
482
483 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().TrainStart();
484 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage("Train " + _caseStepsHelp[_currentStep]);
485 _trainMode = true;
486 }
487
491 public void TrainStop()
492 {
493 if (!_trainMode)
494 {
495 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Error();
496 return;
497 }
498
499 _caseSteps.ForEach(steps => {
500 steps.GetComponent<Renderer>().material = _stepMaterial;
501 steps.SetActive(false);
502 });
503
504 _currentStep = 0;
505 _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(true);
506
507 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().TrainStop();
508 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage(_caseStepsHelp[_currentStep]);
509 _trainMode = false;
510 }
511
516 private void CheckTrainStep(GameObject newStep)
517 {
518 Collider[] collisions = Physics.OverlapSphere(newStep.GetComponent<Renderer>().bounds.center, 0.1f);
519
520 if (!_caseSteps[_currentStep].name.Contains(newStep.name))
521 {
522 Debug.Log("Wrong instrument used!");
523 Destroy(newStep);
524 return;
525 }
526
527 if (!collisions.Contains(_caseSteps[_currentStep].GetComponent<Collider>()))
528 {
529 Debug.Log("Not colliding");
530 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().Error();
531 Destroy(newStep);
532 return;
533 } else
534 {
535 _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(false);
536
537 if (_currentStep == _caseSteps.Count - 1)
538 {
539 TrainStop();
540 Destroy(newStep);
541 return;
542 }
543
544 _currentStep += 1;
545 _caseSteps[_currentStep].SetActive(true);
546
547 GetComponent<VoiceFeedback>().StepNext();
548 GameManager.instance.DisplayMessage("Train " + _caseStepsHelp[_currentStep]);
549 }
550
551 Destroy(newStep);
552 }
553 }
554}
